text: Pale Vidhan Sabha Constituency was one of the 40 Goa Legislative Assembly constituencies of the state of Goa in southern India. Pale was also one of the 20 constituencies falling under the North Goa Lok Sabha constituency.Previous Year's Election Results in Pale, GoaTHE DELIMITATION ACT, 2002 == Members of Legislative Assembly == * 1967: A. K. S. Usgaonkar, Maharashtrawadi Gomantak Party * 1972: A. K. S. Usgaonkar, Maharashtrawadi Gomantak Party * 1977: Laxmikant Surlikar, Indian National Congress * 1980: Vishnu Naik, Maharashtrawadi Gomantak Party * 1984: Chandrakant Verenkar, Indian National Congress * 1989: Vinaykumar Usgaonkar, Maharashtrawadi Gomantak Party * 1994: Sadanand Malik, Maharashtrawadi Gomantak Party * 1999: Suresh Amonkar, Bharatiya Janata Party * 2002: Suresh Amonkar, Bharatiya Janata Party * 2007: Pratap Gawas, Indian National Congress ==References== Category:Defunct Assembly constituencies of Goa Category:North Goa district
title: Pale (Goa Assembly constituency)
